news_header: The German Bundestag elections will shape the country's future and determine party leadership for the next four years.
news_original_title: Miten äänestäisit, jos olisit saksalainen? Testaa, minkä puolueen kannat vastaavat omiasi
news_text: The German Bundestag elections are crucial for the EU's most powerful nation, deciding party leadership for the next four years. Key players include the Christian Democrats (CDU/CSU) led by Friedrich Merz, the right-wing AfD with Alice Weidel, the Social Democrats (SPD) with Olaf Scholz, and the Greens with Robert Habeck. A test is available to explore party positions on various themes, helping voters identify which party aligns with their views. Germany has a 5% threshold for parties to gain representation, making it essential for smaller parties to perform well.
